summary: Minimalist responsive single-page website with centered realistic sunflower bouquet hero image, subtle breathing animation, and a click-to-open glassmorphism note overlay that blurs the background.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Realistic photographic sunflower bouquet, centered composition, clean studio-like lighting, premium feel (sunflower-bouquet-hero.dim_1600x1600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a minimalist, responsive single-page layout with a solid #FAFAFA background and centered hero content that adapts well to mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.
Add a large, realistic photographic sunflower bouquet hero image centered on the screen, and apply a subtle CSS breathing animation that smoothly scales the image by approximately 1%–2% in a loop.
Implement interaction so that clicking the bouquet image or clicking a small "Open Note" button opens a centered overlay note card above the bouquet.

Style the note card using minimalist glassmorphism: translucent frosted glass effect (backdrop-filter blur(10px)), thin semi-transparent white border, soft rounded corners, centered text, and generous line spacing. Use a clean modern sans-serif font (Inter or Montserrat).

Display the provided note content exactly within the note card, and when the note is open, slightly blur the bouquet/background behind the card to keep focus on the message; ensure transitions feel fluid and elegant.
Add the required generated hero image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the hero section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a minimalist, responsive single-page website with #FAFAFA background and modern sans-serif typography (Inter or Montserrat).
Add centered large realistic photographic sunflower bouquet hero image with subtle CSS breathing (scale 1–2%) animation.
Implement interaction: clicking bouquet or an 'Open Note' button opens a centered glassmorphism note card overlay.
Style note card with frosted glass (backdrop-filter blur ~10px), thin semi-transparent white border, soft rounded corners, centered text, generous line spacing.
Display provided note content and, when note is open, slightly blur sunflowers/background to focus on the message; keep animations fluid and elegant.
